urls.title: Subtropical Storm Nicole | Travel Alert from Virgin Atlantic
urls.description: We are currently monitoring Subtropical Storm Nicole, which is forecast to make landfall in Florida on Wednesday evening. At this time, we expect our Miami and Tampa operations to operate as scheduled, however we recommend that you regularly check our website for updates as we continue to evaluate the weather. We are aware of potential disruption to Orlando Airport operations on Wednesday 9th & Thursday 10th November. We are currently working closely with our partners to understand what this means for
